G

GUI - Class in de.aikiit.spamprotector
This class contains the main UI of this application (both input windows and all command buttons).

R

replaceString(String) - Method in class de.aikiit.spamprotector.AsciiConverter
Replaces each character with its ASCII-code representation or does nothing if character is not in the range of 'normal' characters.
replaceString(String) - Method in interface de.aikiit.spamprotector.Converter
Main method to replace a given input (not encoded) and returns the converted input.
